/opt/cuda-10.1/bin/nvcc   -rdc=true -Xptxas -v -O2 -g -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/main_exp.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/main_exp.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/opt/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/8.5.0  src/libHisteq.a src/libInterpgrid.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
